page.title: 15HISTORIC BUILDINGS
page.content: OLD FARM HOUSES. The original Rhiwbebyll Isaf farm dates back, circa 1450, and Lodge farm near Fford Las dates back to Tudor times. PUBS. The White horse inn at Hendrerwydd is over 400 years old, is very quaint and well preserved, and was originally both pub and village store combined. CHURCH. St. Cynhafal's church is a very old building, going back to the 15th century and until 1834 music for the services was supplied by a bass, viola and two clarinettes. At the side of the church is a very beautiful half timbered house built in the 17th century by the Jones family. SMITHY. At Groes Fawr a 200 year old cottage was the smithy until 1967.
